item.description:
10/12/11 Update

I have a better idea on what to plan for the Sleepy Hollow/Tarrytown Meet Up.

I am taking next week off from work.

I hope to be mostly packed up on Thursday night.

Hope to leave around early afternoon on Friday, October 14.

I will be checking into the Extended Stay America Ramsey

Upper Saddle River-Ramsey

112 State Hightway 17

Ramsey, NJ 07446

14 miles from Tarrytown

http://www.hotels.com/hotel/details.html?pa=23&pn=1&ps=23&tab=description&destinationId=1633829&hotelId=202493&arrivalDate=10-14-11&departureDate=10-16-11&rooms[0].numberOfAdults=1&roomno=1&validate=false&previousDateful=false&reviewOrder=date_newest_first#description

 

www.hotels.com/hotel/details.html?pa=23&pn=1&ps=23&tab=description&destinationId=1633829&hotelId=202493&arrivalDate=10-14-11&departureDate=10-16-11&rooms[0].numberOfAdults=1&roomno=1&validate=false&previousDateful=false&reviewOrder=date

Most attractions are Sold out.

  

http://www.hudsonvalle​y.org

www.hudsonvalle​y.org   

I have looked at a few of the other attractions that evening but have not discovered anything that I would be interested in.

They should have a Boucher with more information when I get there.

There might be some interesting attractions that we do not see here on line.

 I might just get something to eat and head back to the hotel.

 There are a lot of things to do Saturday during the day.

 Eco-Fair 2011

When Sat, October 15, 10am – 2pm

Where Patriots Park, Tarrytown, NY 10591 (map   < http://maps.google.com/maps?hl=en&q=Patriots%20Park%2C%20Tarrytown%2C%20NY%2010591 > )

Description Kids crafts, exhibits from the Tarrytown Schools (Washington Irving, Sleepy Hollow Middle and High School), Vendors (green cleaning, energy consultants), Tarrytown Environmental Advisory Council information. There will also be an Aquefest celebration at the Sleepy Hollow High School parking lot on Bedford Road. For more info: www.tarrytownen​vironmental.org ​ < http://www.google.com/url?q=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.tarrytownenvironmental.org&ust=1317780270555000&usg=AFQjCNGU4UgRPElIri_mR3Z99Z5hklLgzg >

 

 

Unknown Zone Member, Alexandra, should be coming in via the train around 4:30 pm

 (She had problems with Meet Up, so she is no longer a member of MU.

I am still in contact with her via e-mail, facebook and other methods.

She is still a member of Unknown Zone as far as I am concerned.)

She wants to go to

Irving's 'Legend'

When Sat, October 15, 5 pm For Her

8 pm for me

Where Old  Dutch Church (Across from Philipsburg Manor) Sleepy Hollow, NY 10591 (map < http://maps.google.com/maps?hl=en&q=Old%20Dutch%20Church%20(Across%20from%20Philipsburg%20Manor)%20Sleepy%20Hollow%2C%20NY%2010591 > )

 

Description Master storyteller Jonathan Kruk offers a dramatic re-telling of Washington Irving’s classic tale, The Legend of Sleepy Hollow, featuring the Headless Horseman, Ichabod Crane, Brom Bones, and Katrina Van Tassel. Flavored with live spooky organ music by Jim Keyes, Kruk’s storytelling captivates all audiences.

Multiple performances each evening: October 8-9, 14-16, 21-23, 27-30.

Parking is at Philipsburg Manor, 381 North Broadway, Sleepy Hollow NY 10591]

There is parking further up the hill that I have used in the past.

For information and tickets:

On Saturday at 8:00, I am going to Irving's Legend

that is probably sold out by now.

http://www.hudsonvalley.org/events/irvings-legend-1

www.hudsonvalley.org/events/irvings-legend-1

http://www.huds​onvalley.org/co​ntent/view/388/​327/

 

http://www.hudsonvalley.org/events/irvings-legend

 

www.hudsonvalley.org/events/irvings-legend

 

More information

 

http://www.visitsleepyhollow.com/calendar

 

www.visitsleepyhollow.com/calendar

 

http://www.visitsleepyhollow.com/

 

www.visitsleepyhollow.com/

 

http://www.hudsonvalley.org

 

www.hudsonvalley.org

 

Eventually, I will be heading back to the hotel.

 

I know that the New York Renaissance Faire is somewhere around this area.

I might go to look for it on the way home.

End of 10/6/11 Update

I have been to Sleepy Hollow/Tarrytown either before and/or

After going to Chiller Con. This time, I will spend the day

seeing the different attractions in Sleepy Hollow during

Halloween season.

http://www.hudsonvalley.org/

www.hudsonvalley.org/

http://www.hudsonvalley.org/plan-your-visit

www.hudsonvalley.org/plan-your-visit
item.how_to_find_us: I will contact those who RSVP Yes. I will have purple backpack.
item.name: Coffee Talk: Sleepy Hollow in Mid October
